originalText.text: This is the first time I took my Shih-tzu cupcake to see Lucky the groomer at Pets on Broadway. I was a little anxious because she hasn't had the best experiences with groomers. But Lucky was very considerate and thorough, here are some before and after pictures. YOU BE THE JUDGE....I definitely will take cupcake to him again. Just love the pics

originalText.text:
I usually don't write reviews but here I go.

Some months ago, I took my dog for grooming like the last 3 times and this time around there was a new employee. The grooming was so bad my dog was bleeding on 2 of his 4 paws and couldn't walk.

I called the establishment, and they provided me a 50$ credit for the next grooming. Funny enough I went back, and the credit wasn't on my account and the manager was nowhere to be found.  So, the issue is the trust. How the hell you can promise something as the manager and don't follow up as promise.

I usually don't write reviews but here I go.

I called the establishment, and they provided me a 50$ credit for the next grooming. Funny enough I went back, and the credit wasn't on my account and the manager was nowhere to be found.  So, the issue is the trust. How the hell you can promise something as the manager and don't follow up as promise.

originalText.text:
My review is based off the grooming itself and the experience.

The experience as a first time customer was less than ideal. Of course no one can predict this would happen but my dog had an allergic reaction to either the products used or a chemical in one of the products. I didn't notice it at the time of pick up in the hustle and bustle of the checkout process but his eyes by the time we got home we're swollen shut. I frantically called to get the product names that were used and report his reaction and ask if anything had occurred during the grooming. I highly doubt If something did happen during grooming- sprayed something in his eyes, shampoo/conditioner got in his eyes- they would say it  but they offered to give him an eye wash solution if I came in before they closed. My partner and I hurried over and they gave us the eye wash free of charge and they put some in his eyes.

The grooming itself was a bit sloppy- He has small tufts of long hair throughout his coat. His eye lashes were cut down and the fur on his neck is like a fade! I asked for the long strands hanging down his ears to be trimmed slightly but they were pretty much cut down to where his ear ends. I paid more for a teeth cleaning and I can't tell if that was done. But I am happy that the groomer recommended the hair cut #7 instead of the #6 because if we had gone with that one - he'd look like a naked mole rat.

Is my dog okay?
He is fine now but the swelling lasted 2 days and he had to take a few halves of benadryl- thankfully he wasn't blinded!

Does the haircut look awful overall? At first glance I didn't like it but it grew on me and hair is hair- it'll grow back so its fine.

Will I go back? Definitely not. Next place I go to I'm taking our own products.

originalText.text: Great service no complain been taking both of my dogs there for a long time but was disappointed about a discount that was offer to me due to me been a employee of the city by the store manager name George when I got to the store to drop off my dog I ask about my discount after I paid 185.00 to get my small dog groom which the price was. Insane because I paid aways less then 150.00 so anyways the young lady that was there confirmed with the manager on some group employees chat that they have about this 15% discount I guess he said yes he did approve it then the young lady when on to contact the store manager name Sam and ask him he said that he don’t give no type of discount to any type of city or state or federal employee so I was disappointed because even though the discount was already offer to me a week ago by a manager I still didn’t get it I just feel that I should of because that’s not my problem that he as a store owner didn’t explain that to his managers

originalText.text:
best groomer i’ve found! they were SO friendly and took the time to go over pricing and details about exactly what i was looking for before the grooming, and even did a little photoshoot with
my little boy after!!! they got all his mats out, seriously the best groom he’s ever gotten! love them!
